column4: Hi is it possible to recompile the kernel without the udevd daemon?
why would you want to do that , udev is critical to the system
ok because I have a problem with that. Each time I download smt I get 100% cpu
udev goest to %100 when you download something ?
yeah. Each time I use the internet connection to transfer files
have you seen if there is a bug logged on launchpad for that ?
yeah I looked for that on launchpad but there are always different bugs from mine
no they usually say it's related to the optical drive...
have you tried unplugging the optical drive ?
ok - so the bug can still be valid then
so what shall I do? I can't use this system in these conditions...
could always kill udev and update the bug report
when I kill the process it just restarts!
